name: Wik and the Fable of Souls
name_original: Wik and the Fable of Souls
description:
Wik and the Fable of Souls is an arcade game developed by Reflexive Entertainment. It came out on 13-09-2004. It was published by Reflexive Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Wik and the Fable of Souls is available on PC.
